import React, { useState } from 'react'; const AddRecipeForm = () => { const [formData, setFormdata] = useState({ title: '', subtitle: '', category: '', paragraphs: [ {pt: 'MALT/GRAIN BILL', pb: 'lkj'}, {pt: 'HOPS/SCHEDULE', pb: ''}, {pt: 'YEAST', pb: ''}, {pt: 'DIRECTIONS', pb: ''} ] }) const { title, subtitle, category, paragraphs } = formData; const onChange = (e) => { setFormdata({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value], [paragraphs[0].pt]: 'kdjafkf' }) } return (
